entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilot Mound 06:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
